text: @MSNBC It is ENTIRELY on you to second guess those judgments during a pandemic. If you are a coordinator of mass public events and willfully ignore scientists and doctors during times of pandemic, you should lose your job and be prosecuted for crimes against humanity #ResignTomPerez
